name: Sanaki
description: Empress of Begnion. Known as the Apostle, voice of the goddess. Young but dutiful ruler. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.
insights: Sanaki is the only hero with Cymbeline.
Sanaki has the highest <abbr title="Attack">ATK</abbr> potential possible among Tome heroes.
Sanaki has the lowest <abbr title="Health Points">HP</abbr> potential possible among Tome heroes.
Sanaki has the lowest <abbr title="Health Points">HP</abbr> potential possible among Red heroes.

dialogue.text: You stand in the presence of Sanaki, Empress of Begnion! I am the Apostle—the voice of the goddess!
Power can cast shadows, as it did over the senate in my realm. The prince and princess here, however, remain radiant. May they stay that way forever.
Oh! Do you have candy? I mean, I am far from being a child and care nothing for such things. But if you have some, I wouldn't say no.
You always strive to do so much for everyone. And so I reward you now with my thanks.
I have an older sister who I didn't know about for years. But she has become so precious to me.
I will now present to you my full name—Sanaki Kirsch Altina. I expect you will remember it.
You are standing in the presence of Sanaki—37th Empress of Begnion. You may kneel, if you wish.
It's only natural for the Apostle.
Average things can happen to even the Apostle.
It's...a fluke. That's all. No reason to fret.
What was that? I felt as if I just transcended in some way!

Hmpf. I seem to have grown while here in this world. Have you noticed any differences? I mean, avert your eyes! You gaze upon the Empress of Begnion! I am a privilege to behold! And yet, you don't give a fig for all that, do you? You stand in my presence without fear. Most would beg my permission to approach. But not you. I must say that I find it...refreshing. Still, I am not a commoner, and though I seem to be a girl like any other, I am not. I don't have the luxury of acting juvenile. But when I'm with you, I wish I did. I think you might be a bad influence on me. How curious. I wonder what it means... Still, never forget who I am—the Empress of Begnion!
